concept.definition: The amount is partial or complete settlement of the amounts due.
The amount is an adjustment regarding claims already paid.
The amount is an advance against future claims.

description: This value set includes sample Payment Type codes.
name: Payment Type Codes

text.div:
Payment Type Codes

This value set includes sample Payment Type codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/payment-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
payment PaymentThe amount is partial or complete settlement of the amounts due.
adjustment AdjustmentThe amount is an adjustment regarding claims already paid.
advance AdvanceThe amount is an advance against future claims.
